recipe_cards.name: Eggs and bacon
recipe_cards.description: A delicious and simple breakfast to kickstart your morning.
steps: 1. Use fresh eggs. Fry in non-stick frying pan.
2. Fry bacon in same pan and wiping off extra grease until crisp.

recipe_cards.name: Tomato soup
recipe_cards.description: Hearty and rich soup that won't leave you feeling too heavy. Use ripe tomatoes for extra flavor.
steps: 1. Use a blender to blend tomatoes.
2. Pour into pot and add chicken broth.
3. Add small amount of heavy cream.
4. Pour into bowl, garnish with basil.

recipe_cards.name: Pasta carbonara
recipe_cards.description: A delicious pasta dish from Rome, filled with pieces of pork. Best with flat pasta such as linguine.
steps: 2. Fry bacon pieces in pan with onions and garlic.
3. Drain pasta, and while hot, mix in 3 large egg yolks and parmesan.
